bug.author: monchier
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
Type here a clear and concise description of the bug. Aim for 2-3 sentences. <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>streamlit run https://raw.githubusercontent.com/streamlit/demo-self-driving/master/app.py </denchmark-code>
Go to UI Select "Run App" <denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
No error is shown <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
Error is shown in UI <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/6821233/73867484-a9d6a000-47fb-11ea-8449-773ffdbcdc9b.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
Yes <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: 0.54 - works on 0.50
<denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://streamlit.slack.com/archives/C9FJJN8Q7/p1580863248028900>https://streamlit.slack.com/archives/C9FJJN8Q7/p1580863248028900</denchmark-link>
